events.title: Valentine's Day Party
events.description: Celebrate love with an evening of romantic ballroom dancing and refreshments!

events.title: Student Graduation
events.description: Celebrate our your loved one's dance accomplishments and enjoy some social dancing with all of our graduates!

events.title: Viennese Waltz Intensive
events.description: Learn and practice your viennese waltz with this progressive class. Challenge your knowledge and practice your skills every wednesday night in February.

events.title: Freestyles
events.description: Test your skills and enjoy dancing with your peers in this fun multi-heat dance event! Talk to your instructor to learn how to participate.

events.title: Free Lovebirds Class
events.description: Learn the basics and make a move at this free dance lesson aimed towards towards couples celebrating an early valentines.
